location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of a ‘Tracing of “Warba” Island and Vicinity made by H.M.S. Sphynx in 1903’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with crayon on tracing paperDimensions:204 x 330 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Copy of a tracing of an outline map attached to a letter no. C-182 dated 18th May 1934 (folios 313-319).Produced to show the position of a small island located south west of Warba within Kuwait territory with Kuwait boundary indicated by red dash-dot line. Al Tha’alib and vicinity marked in red and hatched; position of Um Qasr Fort shown.“B” inserted in blue crayon in the upper centre.
